title: DEATH TO SPIES
description:
Set in World War II, the player's character is a captain in the eponymous Soviet counterintelligence agency (SMERSH).

Smersh is short for "Death to Spies" (SMERt' SHpionam, Russ: ÃÂ¡ÃÅ“Ãâ€¢ÃÂ Ã‘â€šÃ‘Å’ ÃÂ¨ÃÂ¿ÃÂ¸ÃÂ¾ÃÂ½ÃÂ°ÃÂ¼) in Russian, and was the name of a set of counterintelligence agencies formed in the Soviet Army during World War II around 1943. Their mission was to secure the rear of the active Red Army by arresting traitors, deserters, spies and criminal cells. During the war these agents became the main force combating the German intelligence service. As captain of the 4th department of Smersh, it is the player's job to execute these operations in the heart of enemy territory. Players are required to complete various tasks, including stealing important documents, eliminating enemy officers, kidnapping high-ranking officials, and sabotaging enemy plans.


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

-MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS:
Windows 2000/XP
MINIMUM
Intel Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD Athlon 1.8 GHz Processor
512 MB RAM
3 GB Hard Disk Space
NVIDIA GeForce 5200 / ATI Radeon 9500 128 MB RAM Video Card
DirectX 9.0c compatibile Sound Card
-RECOMMENDED:
Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2.4 GHz + Processor
1 GB RAM
NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / ATI Radeon X800 256 MB RAM Video Card
